tool_description: Manages RFP amendments and modifications, tracking changes and ensuring proper notification to all vendors.

amendment_type.description: Type of amendment (deadline extension, requirement change, clarification)

change_description.description: Detailed description of the changes being made

affected_sections.description: RFP sections affected by the amendment

new_deadline.description: New proposal submission deadline if applicable

error_messages: Invalid original RFP ID: Provide valid existing RFP document identifier.
Invalid amendment type: Use deadline extension, requirement change, or clarification.
Missing change description: Detailed description of changes is required.
Invalid affected sections: Specify valid RFP section references.
Invalid new deadline: New deadline must be in the future and in ISO 8601 format.
usage: Reference the original RFP ID and specify amendment type, change description, and affected sections. Include new deadline if extending submission period. The tool creates amendment documents and tracks all changes.

change_log.description: Chronological log of all changes made to the RFP
